data.name: Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire - The Deck of Many Things
data.detailed_description:
The Deck of Many Things DLC adds a new merchant vessel that sails the high the Deadfire Archipelago. Laden with exotic items from across the far corners of Eora, the Deck of Many Things is open for business, but enterprising buccaneers can try to take the ship’s bounty by force.

Included in this DLC:
• Adds a new NPC ship ‘the Deck of Many Things’ to the world map.
• Purchase a wide array of items, or test your mettle against the ship’s defenders, and seize the treasures maliciously.
data.about_the_game:
The Deck of Many Things DLC adds a new merchant vessel that sails the high the Deadfire Archipelago. Laden with exotic items from across the far corners of Eora, the Deck of Many Things is open for business, but enterprising buccaneers can try to take the ship’s bounty by force.

Included in this DLC:
• Adds a new NPC ship ‘the Deck of Many Things’ to the world map.
• Purchase a wide array of items, or test your mettle against the ship’s defenders, and seize the treasures maliciously.
data.short_description: Come aboard the Deck of Many Things and shop or seize a wide array of new items.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
